title: Why Action Will End Your Suffering | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.  If you want your question answered by Tom in an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.    CORRECTION: Steve Aoki will be at NYCC booth #236 on October 5th, not October 4th.    Just announced our Comic Book collaboration with Steve Aoki, called Neon Future! Pre-order your copy of the comic book here: comics.impacttheory.com Be sure to follow along with Impact Theory Comics on Instagram as we continue our journey to create a studio that will rival Disney: http://bit.ly/2BwgFam   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: Sanebox. Visit sanebox.com/IMPACT to sign up for your 14-day free trial and receive a $25 credit. SaneBox brings sanity back to your inbox by prioritizing what's important, removing spam/junk, grouping newsletters together, and automating tedious tasks.   Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact   PEOPLE MENTIONED Chase (Tom's book recommender): http://bit.ly/2zugb1J   BOOKS MENTIONED   Measure What Matters by John Doerr: https://amzn.to/2zu3VOx [27:30]    QUESTION TOPICS Why action ultimately cures all [4:18] How to get over the anxiety of executing on your dreams [7:22] Why belief will guide you towards success...or failure [10:30] Tom gives advice on which path in life to take: invest in your family or career? [14:51] How to mentally prepare yourself for making a lot of money [17:27] How should I pivot from my dream without being a "quitter"? [19:50] Why you can do anything you want...but not everything [22:31] How to retain content you consume [25:55]
